verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> month, in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> after they had <S%H3318>come<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H5375>"Take<s%> a <S%H7218>census<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male,<s%> <S%H1538>head<s%> by <S%H1538>head<s%>

from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> [is able to] <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H6635>war<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H6485>number<s%> them by their <S%H6635>armies.<s%>
"With you, moreover, there shall be a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H4294>tribe,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> of his father's <S%H1004>household.<s%>

<S%H428>"These<s%> then are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> with you: of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H468>Elizur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7707>Shedeur;<s%>
of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H8017>Shelumiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6701>Zurishaddai;<s%>
of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab;<s%>
of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> <S%H5417>Nethanel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6686>Zuar;<s%>
of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2497>Helon;<s%>

of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph:<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H476>Elishama<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud;<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H1583>Gamaliel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6301>Pedahzur;<s%>
of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H27>Abidan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1441>Gideoni;<s%>
of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> <S%H295>Ahiezer<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5996>Ammishaddai;<s%>
of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> <S%H6295>Pagiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5918>Ochran;<s%>
of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> <S%H460>Eliasaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1845>Deuel;<s%>
of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H299>Ahira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5881>Enan.<s%>

<S%H428>"These<s%> are they <S%H7148>who<s%> were <S%H7148>called<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> of their fathers' <S%H4294>tribes;<s%> they were the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H505>divisions<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> had been <S%H9344>designated<s%> by <S%H8034>name,<s%>

and they <S%H6950>assembled<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> together on the <S%H259>first<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%> Then they <S%H3205>registered<s%> by <S%H3205>ancestry<s%> in their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H1538>head<s%> by <S%H1538>head,<s%>
<S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%> So he <S%H6485>numbered<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>

Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> Israel's first-born, their <S%H8435>genealogical<s%> <S%H8435>registration<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names,<s%> <S%H1538>head<s%> by <S%H1538>head,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> [was able to] <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H6635>war,<s%>
their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> [were] 46500.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> their <S%H8435>genealogical<s%> <S%H8435>registration<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names,<s%> <S%H1538>head<s%> by <S%H1538>head,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> [was able to] <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H6635>war,<s%>
their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> [were] 59300.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> their <S%H8435>genealogical<s%> <S%H8435>registration<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> [was able to] <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H6635>war,<s%>
their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> [were] 45650.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> their <S%H8435>genealogical<s%> <S%H8435>registration<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> [was able to] <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H6635>war,<s%>
their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> [were] 74600.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> their <S%H8435>genealogical<s%> <S%H8435>registration<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> [was able to] <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H6635>war,<s%>
their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> [were] 54400.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> their <S%H8435>genealogical<s%> <S%H8435>registration<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> [was able to] <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H6635>war,<s%>
their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> [were] 57400.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> [namely,] of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> their <S%H8435>genealogical<s%> <S%H8435>registration<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> [was able to] <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H6635>war,<s%>
their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> [were] 40500.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> their <S%H8435>genealogical<s%> <S%H8435>registration<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> [was able to] <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H6635>war,<s%>
their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> [were] 32200.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> their <S%H8435>genealogical<s%> <S%H8435>registration<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> [was able to] <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H6635>war,<s%>
their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> [were] 35400.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> their <S%H8435>genealogical<s%> <S%H8435>registration<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> [was able to] <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H6635>war,<s%>
their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> [were] 62700.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> their <S%H8435>genealogical<s%> <S%H8435>registration<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> [was able to] <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H6635>war,<s%>
their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> [were] 41500.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> their <S%H8435>genealogical<s%> <S%H8435>registration<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> [was able to] <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H6635>war,<s%>
their <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> [were] 53400.

<S%H428>These<s%> are the ones who were <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> with the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> of <S%H259>whom<s%> was of his father's <S%H1004>household.<s%>

So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> [was able to] <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H6635>war<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>
even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6485>numbered<s%> men were 603550.
The <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> however, were not <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them by their fathers' <S%H4294>tribe.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H389>"Only<s%> the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> you shall not <S%H6485>number,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall you <S%H5375>take<s%> their <S%H7218>census<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"But you shall <S%H6485>appoint<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>furnishings<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that belongs to it. They shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>furnishings,<s%> and they shall <S%H8334>take<s%> <S%H8334>care<s%> of it; they shall also <S%H2583>camp<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

"So when the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> is to <S%H5265>set<s%> out, the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H3381>take<s%> it <S%H3381>down;<s%> and when the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H2583>encamps,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H6965>set<s%> it up. But the <S%H2114>layman<s%> who <S%H7131>comes<s%> <S%H7131>near<s%> shall be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

"And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H2583>camp,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> by his own <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> by his own <S%H1714>standard,<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies.<s%>

"But the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H2583>camp<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> that there may be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7110>wrath<s%> on the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> So the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony.<s%>"

Thus the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did;<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> they <S%H6213>did.<s%>
